long_description: You'll live comfortably in the Acadia 4 tent from Kelty. It boasts large doors, dual vestibules and easy setup. Large dual doors offer easy access; a large front vestibule and a smaller rear one offer covered storage and protected entrances. 3-pole design and clip construction ensure a fast and easy setup. High-quality fiberglass poles offer excellent performance at a lower cost than aluminum. Freestanding design is easy to move around for ideal campsite placement. All seams are factory-taped to ensure excellent weather protection. Mesh wall panels offer good cross ventilation and visibility. ArcEdge(TM) floor stays taut; design keeps waterproof seams off the ground. UV-resistant polyester rainfly will not stretch when wet, ensuring a consistently taut pitch. Fly attaches to tent via easy-to-use and secure side-release buckles. Fly vents keep air circulating within the tent. Features multiple guyout points and noiseless zipper pulls. Internal storage pockets store small essentials. Kelty Acadia 4 tent comes with stuff sacks and stakes.
short_description: You'll live comfortably in the Acadia 4 tent from Kelty. It boasts large doors, dual vestibules and easy setup.
